title: Union Budget: FM Sitharaman cuts customs duty on minerals critical for energy transition
description: Nirmala Sitharaman announced customs duty cuts on minerals for energy transition and initiatives for solar panels and Bharat Small Reactors. Biogas and AUSC thermal plants by NTPC-BHEL were highlighted, along with energy efficiency measures and carbon market transitions. Policies aim to balance employment, growth, and sustainability while boosting domestic solar glass manufacturing.
